data.comment: The big names in today's match at Johan Cruijff Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Vitesse get the game underway.
In the minute 10, Perr Schuurs (Ajax) has received a first yellow card.
Quincy Promes is on target to give Ajax a 1-0 advantage.
Noussair Mazraoui with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Jurrien Timber is on a sub for Perr Schuurs for Ajax.
At Johan Cruijff Arena, Thomas Bruns has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
He's off! Edson Alvarez is shown a red card.
In the minute 45, Daley Blind (Ajax) gets a yellow card.
Tomas Hajek (Vitesse) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, Ajax have kicked-off the second half at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Ajax make their second substitution with Jurgen Ekkelenkamp replacing Zakaria Labyad.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Riechedly Bazoer.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Oussama Darfalou with Armando Broja. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Letsch.
The away team replace Thomas Bruns with Patrick Vroegh.
Goal! Antony Santos gives Ajax a 2-1 lead in Amsterdam.
In the minute 70, Great play from Mohammed Kudus to set up the goal.
Vitesse's Maximilian Wittek has been booked in Amsterdam.
Thomas Letsch is making the team's third substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Thomas Buitink replacing Eli Dasa.
In the minute 81, Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a fourth substitution, with Million Manhoef replacing Maximilian Wittek.
Oussama Tannane is booked for the away team.
Sergino Dest is replacing Noussair Mazraoui for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
In the minute 89, Nicolas Tagliafico (Ajax) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Lassina Franck Traore is replacing Quincy Promes for Ajax at Johan Cruijff Arena.
